reasons_to_visit.details: June offers the best weather conditions with warm temperatures and minimal rainfall.
Longest days of the year provide maximum daylight for sightseeing and photography.
Multiple outdoor festivals, concerts, and cultural events throughout the city.
Warm evenings and beautiful sunset lighting make June ideal for couples.
All seasonal attractions, river cruises, and outdoor activities are fully operational.

reasons_to_avoid.details: June is one of the busiest months with long lines at popular attractions.
Peak season pricing for accommodations, dining, and activities.
Popular restaurants and attractions require reservations well in advance.
